instructions:
Heat oven to 375 F. Combine Crisco, sugar, milk and vanilla in mixing bowl and cream. Beat at medium
speed until blended. Beat in egg. Combine flour, salt and baking soda and beat into mixture at low speed.
Stir in nuts and chocolate chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 9
minutes for chewy cookies or 11 to 13 minutes for crisp cookies. Makes about 4 dozen. 
*(Rev. 12/14/96)*
name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
